sch.ov: The Azure Region where the reserved resource lives.

Properties of reservation purchase request

v.desc: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable. Required and need to provide tenantId and managementGroupId if AppliedScopeType is ManagementGroup

managementGroupId.desc: Fully-qualified identifier of the management group where the benefit must be applied.

resourceGroupId.desc: Fully-qualified identifier of the resource group.

tenantId.desc: Tenant ID where the savings plan should apply benefit.

sch.v: ManagementGroup

sch.ov: List of the subscriptions that the benefit will be applied. Do not specify if AppliedScopeType is Shared.
sch.v: List of the subscriptions that the benefit will be applied. Do not specify if AppliedScopeType is Shared. This property will be deprecated and replaced by appliedScopeProperties instead for Single AppliedScopeType.

sch.ov: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing Reservation
sch.v: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing reservation or savings plan
Friendly name of the reservation

sch.ov: Quantity of the SKUs that are part of the Reservation. Must be greater than zero.
sch.v: Quantity of the skus that are part of the reservation. Must be greater than zero.

sch.ov: The type of the resource that is being reserved.
sch.v: The type of the resource that is being reserved. In addition to below types we have also added the following: OpenAIPTU, MDC, Sentinel.

v.desc: This is the date-time when the Azure hybrid benefit needs to be reviewed.

sch.v: Represent the term of reservation.
The name of sku

sch.ov: Fully qualified id of the Reservation being purchased. This value is only guaranteed to be non-null if the purchase is successful.
sch.v: Fully qualified id of the reservation being purchased. This value is only guaranteed to be non-null if the purchase is successful.

sch.ov: Fully qualified id of the ReservationOrder being purchased
sch.v: Fully qualified id of the reservationOrder being purchased

v.desc: Details of the savings plans being purchased

billingCurrencyTotal.desc: Pricing information containing the amount and the currency code

currencyCode.desc: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

prop.desc: Request body for savings plan purchase
Properties of a savings plan purchase

appliedScopeProperties.desc: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable. Required and need to provide tenantId and managementGroupId if AppliedScopeType is ManagementGroup

managementGroupId.desc: Fully-qualified identifier of the management group where the benefit must be applied.

resourceGroupId.desc: Fully-qualified identifier of the resource group.

tenantId.desc: Tenant ID where the savings plan should apply benefit.

billingPlan.desc: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

billingScopeId.desc: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing reservation or savings plan

allOf.desc: Pricing information containing the amount and the currency code

currencyCode.desc: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

displayName.desc: Friendly name of the savings plan

term.desc: Represent savings plan term in ISO 8601 format.

savingsPlanId.desc: Fully qualified id of the savings plan being purchased. This value is only guaranteed to be non-null if the purchase is successful.

savingsPlanOrderId.desc: Fully qualified id of the savings plan order being purchased

sch.v: Error information
Extended error information including error code and error message
Error code describing the reason that service is not able to process the incoming request
